pages.text: $(li)The Four Leaf Clover is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/buzzier_bees/luck)Potion of Luck$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) inside of the $(l:patchouli:structures/desert_temple)Desert Temples$(/l) or Dungeons over the Overworld.
$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/apiarist)Apiarists$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by a Four Leaf Clover.
